subTitle: Join our Marketplace - Buy CRE Loans Directly from Banks

locations.title: What is Metechi?
locations.text: Metechi is a Bank-centered Syndication Marketplace providing banks with instant access to a broad universe of pre-screened lenders to fund or sell their Commercial Real Estate loans.

banks.title: Agent Banks
banks.text1: Compete with big banks, better serve your clients, and easily observe regulatory constraints.
banks.text2: Get premier access to our qualified institutional- investor-base to syndicate CRE loans.

author.position: Talk directly to our Head of BD
author.name: Charles Greenwald

participants.title: Institutional Investors
participants.text: Build a portfolio that excites by going beyond your reach. Choose your favorite deals and let the banks do the heavy lifting for you
participants.text2: CRE syndication opportunities originated by banks. Connect directly to senior debt opportunities

author.position: Talk directly to our Head of IR
author.name: Stephanie Rieben
